title: Silver Medal Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (OSI) 2019
subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (POSI)
description: OSI is a city level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: Gold Medal Olimpiade Sains Pra OSK (OSPO) 2020
subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (POSI)
description: OSPO is a city level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: Silver Medal of National Science Competition city level 2020
subtitle: Issued by The Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology
description: National Science Competition or Kompetisi Sains Nasional (KSN), now Olimpiade Sains Nasional (OSN) is an official Olympiad by The Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology. This event followed by highschool throughout Indonesia. Started from city level elimination, then province level elimitation, and finally the National. The competition consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography. I got silver medal in this competition.

title: Gold Medal Basic Science Competition (BSC) 2020
subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (POSI)
description: BSC is a city level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: 5th Runner Up of Ruangguru Champion Online Edition5th
subtitle: Issued by PT Ruang Raya Indonesia
description: Ruangguru Champion is a competition held by one of the most popular cram school in Indonesia. This event was followed by highschool in all over Indonesia. This competition is a 'first come, first serve' quiz contest. The field being tested are what we usually learn at school, namely Math, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. Me and my teamates manage to went through the regional stage and get 5th place in the national stage.

title: Gold Medal Indonesian Youth Science Competition (IYSC) 2020
subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (POSI)
description: IYSC is a province level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: Gold Medal Tryout Nasional Menjelang KSN-K 2021
subtitle: Issued by Tesla Edu Center (TEC)
description: Tryout Nasional Menjelang KSN-K is a province level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: Gold Medal NSC 2021
subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia
description: NSC or National Science Competition is an olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography. Indonesia'n translation of the name will sound like to the official one. But this competition is not official. Therefore, isn't attended by the students all over Indonesia.

title: 4th Runner Up of Olimpiade Sains Merdeka (OSM) 2021
subtitle: Issued by PEMA University of Sumatera Utara
description: NESO is a province level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

subtitle: Issued by Pelatihan Olimpiade Sains Indonesia (POSI)
description: Olimpiade Sains Nusantara is a city level olympiad consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography.

title: Top 100 Finalist of National Science Competition 2021
subtitle: Issued by The Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology
description: National Science Competition or Kompetisi Sains Nasional (KSN), now Olimpiade Sains Nasional (OSN) is an official Olympiad by The Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology. This event followed by highschool throughout Indonesia. Started from city level elimination, then province level elimitation, and finally the National. The competition consist of 9 fields which are informatics, mathematics, physics, chemistry, astronomy, geoscience, economics, biology, and geography. I become the top 100 finalist from students all over Indonesia.

title: 2nd Winner of Game Development MAGE 7
subtitle: Issued by Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology
description: Game Development MAGE 7 is a National competition about Game Development by Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology held for about 1.5 months of development. This competition started from creating proposal, then developing the game, and then pitch product presentation about the game.
